title: E.U. Takes Aim at Big Tech’s Power With Landmark Digital Act - The New York Times
content:
1. E.U. Takes Aim at Big Tech’s Power With Landmark Digital Act  The New York Times
  2. EU in 'final countdown' to big tech crackdown  Tech Xplore
  3. Controversial New Law for Big Tech in Europe Expected This Week  Bloomberg
  4. How Big Tech lost the antitrust battle with Europe  Financial Times
  5. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The European Union was expected to finalize the Digital Markets Act, the most sweeping legislation to regulate tech since a European privacy law was passed in 2018.
